nodes.text: The Cargamalis system was a star system located in the Bruanii sector, at the far edge of the Western Reaches portion of the Mid Rim. It was the last stop on the Corellian Trade Spine hyperlane before passing through Mugaari Space and entering the Greater Javin region of the Outer Rim Territories.

The Cargamalis system was created for "Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin," a 2004 Wizards of the Coast online supplement for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the system in grid square K-18.
